text:
http://www.educationpartners.com | Austin, TX | ONSITE | Full-time

- Platform architect: https://educationpartners.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=18

- Devops engineer: https://educationpartners.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=17

We're a startup working with higher education institutions. We want to change the way students and institutions interact.

The interview process is a couple a phone screens, followed by an onsite visit to meet the team.
